name: workflowType
column4: The kind of Computational Workflow, which is designed to compose and execute a series of computational or data manipulation steps in a scientific application

name: workflowCodeRepository
column4: A link to the repository where the un-compiled, human readable code and related code is located (e.g. GitHub, GitLab, SVN)

name: workflowDocumentation
column4: A link (URL) to the documentation or text describing the Computational Workflow and its use
